title: Hour 2: Uncoordinated?
description:
In this episode, Dan Orlovsky, Katie George, and Domonique Foxworth return to debate Bill Belichick's strategy in failing to name an offensive coordinator ahead of the start of the season. The crew is joined by Jeff Darlington to discuss whether the penalties given to the Dolphins due to their tampering violations were too harsh or not harsh enough. Plus, we predict which NFC East QB will have the better season. We remember and pay tribute to Hall of Fame Dodgers broadcaster Vin Scully after his passing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Can the Patriots have success without naming an offensive play-caller?
